sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom';
import { View, Text, StyleSheet, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, ScrollView, Image } from 'react-native';
import { personList } from '../../Application/Classes/testDataGenerator';

const PersonDetail = () => {
    const { id } = useParams();
    const person = personList.find(p => p.personenNr.toString() === id);

    if (!person) {
        return <Text style={styles.error}>Person nicht gefunden!</Text>;
    }

    return (
        <ScrollView contentContainerStyle={styles.container}>
            {/* Header */}
            <View style={styles.header}>
                <View style={styles.nameContainer}>
                    <Text style={styles.nameText}>{person.vorname}</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.nameText}>{person.nachname}</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.imageContainer}>
                    <Image source={{ uri: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150' }} style={styles.image} />
                </View>
            </View>

            {/* Options-Leiste */}
            <View style={styles.optionsBar}>
                {["Allgemein", "Kontakte", "Zuordnung", "Einbringer", "Künstler", "Exponate", "Verrechnung", "USW"].map((option, index) => (
                    <TouchableOpacity key={index} style={styles.optionButton}>
                        <Text style={styles.optionText}>{option}</Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                ))}
            </View>

            {/* Eingabe- und Textbereiche */}
            <View style={styles.content}>
                <View style={styles.leftColumn}>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Personen-Nummer:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder={person.personenNr.toString()} />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Betreuer:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder={person.betreuer || "Kein Betreuer"} />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Korrespondenz:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder="Manuell eintragen" />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Sprache:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder={person.sprache || "Nicht angegeben"} />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Anrede:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder="Anrede auswählen" />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Titel-Extra:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder="Titel-Extra" />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Titel-Vorgestellt:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder="Titel-Vorgestellt" />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Vorname:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder={person.vorname} />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputField}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Nachname:</Text>
                        <TextInput style={styles.input} placeholder={person.nachname} />
                    </View>
                </View>

                <View style={styles.rightColumn}>
                    <View style={styles.textArea}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Bemerkung:</Text>
                        <TextInput
                            style={styles.largeInput}
                            multiline
                            placeholder="Bemerkungen eintragen"
                        />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.textArea}>
                        <Text style={styles.label}>Persönliches:</Text>
                        <TextInput
                            style={styles.largeInput}
                            multiline
                            placeholder="Persönliche Informationen eintragen"
                        />
                    </View>
                </View>
            </View>
        </ScrollView>
    );
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: { padding: 20, backgroundColor: '#fff' },
    error: { color: 'red', fontSize: 20, textAlign: 'center' },
    header: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: 20 },
    nameContainer: { justifyContent: 'center' },
    nameText: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold', marginRight: 10 },
    imageContainer: { justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' },
    image: { width: 100, height: 100, borderRadius: 50 },
    optionsBar: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        justifyContent: 'space-around',
        backgroundColor: 'orange',
        paddingVertical: 10,
        marginBottom: 20,
        borderRadius: 5,
    },
    optionButton: { padding: 5 },
    optionText: { color: 'white', fontWeight: 'bold' },
    content: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between' },
    leftColumn: { width: '45%' },
    rightColumn: { width: '45%' },
    inputField: { marginBottom: 10 },
    label: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 5 },
    input: {
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: '#ccc',
        borderRadius: 5,
        padding: 8,
        fontSize: 14,
    },
    textArea: { marginBottom: 20 },
    largeInput: {
        height: 100,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: '#ccc',
        borderRadius: 5,
        textAlignVertical: 'top',
        padding: 10,
        fontSize: 14,
    },
});

export default PersonDetail;
